tasks.description: Hello. Thank you for using this program. This is a simple to-do list.

On the left side of the program is the section in which the categories are located. For example, in one category you write down a shopping list, in another you write down the movies you want to watch, etc.
To add a category, click the "Add Category" button

On the right side of the program is a section with a to-do list. Here you can edit the category title by simply clicking on the text or delete it by clicking on the cross. The same goes for the to-do list. The list can be marked as complete.
Below there is a field called "New task", Enter some text and click the plus to add a task
In the lower right corner there is a button to sync your data between different devices. You will need to sign in with your Google account
JavaScript: The Definitive Guide Flanagan D.
Categories created as an example. you can delete all categories and to-do lists and create your own.
